title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-13.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-13.9 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Subpart or its application to any person or circumstance is held to be invalid, the remainder of this Subpart and the application of that provision to other persons or circumstances will not be affected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-13.9

Adopted
by

New

York State Register April 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 15, eff. 4/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
